description:
Description
Cross-section data on the credit history for a sample of applicants for a type of credit card.
title: Expenditure and Default Data
reference:
According to Greene (2003, p. 952) dependents equals 1 + number of dependents, 
our calculations suggest that it equals number of dependents.

parameters.share: Ratio of monthly credit card expenditure to yearly income.
parameters.owner: Factor. Does the individual own their home?
parameters.age: Age in years plus twelfths of a year.
parameters.card: Factor. Was the application for a credit card accepted?
parameters.majorcards: Number of major credit cards held.

format: A data frame containing 1,319 observations on 12 variables.
